value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Enemies are approaching! Everyone
at the ready, quick!$k$p$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|The time has come for us to be of
use. Catherine, Shamir, show them
the strength of the Knights of Seiros.$k$p$WmMPID_カトリーヌ,ch17_33_Catherine_F_Normal,Face|Will do! No matter the foe, we'll make
them regret challenging us. Isn't that
right, partner?$k$p$WmMPID_シャミア,ch17_34_Shamir_F_Normal,Face|Sure. I won't turn down a paying job.$k$p$WmMPID_フレン,ch17_28_Flayn_F_Normal,Face|Wait a moment! I will join you
in battle!$k$p$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|Flayn! What are you doing here? It is
far too dangerous. You are to return
to your room at once.$k$p$WmMPID_フレン,ch17_28_Flayn_F_Normal,Face|I am no child! I can hold my own
in battle!$k$p$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|Do as you are told. I cannot focus on
the situation at hand with you here.$k$p$WmMPID_カトリーヌ,ch17_33_Catherine_F_Normal,Face|Oh, will you fight alongside us,
Seteth? It's not often that we see you
in combat.$k$p$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|Unfortunately, we are shorthanded at
the moment, and even you two have
your limits.$k$p$WmMPID_フレン,ch17_28_Flayn_F_Normal,Face|I'm here too!$k$p$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|Flayn! What are you still doing here?
If you refuse to return to your room,
then go hide...somewhere!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Everyone, hurry! The enemy is
almost here!$k$p$WmMPID_シャミア,ch17_34_Shamir_F_Normal,Face|So it seems...$k$p$WmMPID_カトリーヌ,ch17_33_Catherine_F_Normal,Face|We'll pay for it if we don't act quick.
Seteth, we're going on ahead.$k$p$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|No, I am coming as well. Flayn, we
can talk about this later but for now,
please be patient and wait here. OK?$k$p$WmMPID_フレン,ch17_28_Flayn_F_Normal,Face|Hmph...$k$p
